interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids
Review Date: 2020/08/11
Store: AUGNORYE
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'}
Review Text: I don't get why the capes are such crap in the these sets. Whether it's an electric razor set or scissors, they are always cheap mess no matter the brand! That's my only complaint. I had to buy a separate cape which was annoying but the scissors, combs and clips are nice! Good value!
Review Title: Great set except for the cape
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Optic Shop Pro-Moisture Chamber With Elastic Head Band - Size Small
Optic Shop
['Small PRO-MOISTURE CHAMBER WITH ELASTIC HEAD BAND - White Foam. One Elastic Chamber. Ideal for dry-eye conditions. Clear vinyl shield with soft sponge edging that gently hugs facial contours. Product dimensions: 40mm vertical, 60mm Horizontal. Combat miserable dry eye conditions with the Pro-Moisture Chamber with Elastic Head Band from Optic Shop. Clear vinyl shielding offers ideal eye protection. Inner lining of soft sponge material hugs the contours of the face and provides hours of comfortable wear. Comes with comfortable elastic head band, and fits both the left and right eyes. Size Small and package quantity of 1.']
{'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Foam', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.2 x 2.36 x 1.57 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': '144SB', 'Date First Available': 'May 20, 2015', 'Manufacturer': 'Optic Shop'}
I bought this when I had a bout of bells palsy and I wish I wouldn't have wasted the money. I didn't really use it even though it was a great idea it was just uncomfortable and kept fogging up. The foam around it is rough and hurt the soft skin around my eye. The strap I found to be fine once I tied it off to fit me. I still have it and if I ever have another bout of BP I might glue or somehow put some soft fabric around it. Won't fix the fogging up but it might make it feel a little more comfortable. Don't have anything to lose. I wouldn't wear it like it is.
Great idea....
Butecare Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum for Long - Amazon Vine
{'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Didn't work at all for me. Plus I was really worried about what would happen if it got into my eyes. They made it clear to NOT get it on your eyelids because it doesn't need to go into your eyes. That worries me because I know no matter how careful I am there's probably going to some that will drip down into my eye. Anything that's going on or around my eyes shouldn't be toxic. And maybe they only say that as a precaution and it wouldn't hurt your eye but I don't like to take chances with my eyes.
No luck for me
Anti-Aging Hydrating Serum with Natural Mango Micro-beads, Vitamins E and C, Natural and Organic Plant Extracts, Paraben-Free, 30 ml, Made in France, Phytema
PHYTEMA
['Anti-Aging Hydrating Serum with Natural Mango Micro-beads, Vitamins E and C, Natural and Organic Plant Extracts, Paraben-Free, 30 ml, Made in France, Phytema']
{'Brand': 'PHYTEMA', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Item Volume': '30 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'PHYTEMA'}
I've had some splotchy acne here and there. Not like teenage acne but I get little flesh colored bumps in certain areas/patches on my face and neck. I started thinking maybe I had too much bacteria on my face even though I wash it everyday but decided to use dial soap on it. That wasn't helping at all. I heard that serums are really good on your face and if your face isn't well moisturized it will produce more sebum which in turns can cause more acne. This stuff has been great! It's not completely gone but it's a lot better. I didn't take any pictures cause since they were flesh colored you could hardly see them especially in a photo. I feel like my skin glows a little better since I've been using this too. I was afraid "vit C" would break me out cause of the acids but Apparently it's the opposite. Those acids are good for your skin. I would certainly recommend this!
Helped my acne
AuroTrends Makeup Remover Towel,2 Pack Reusable Chemical-free Microfiber Makeup Remover Cloths,Magically and Gently Wipe Away Cosmetics,Sunscreen,Oil and Dirt,Set of 2 (Pink+Black)
AuroTrends
{'Brand': 'AuroTrends', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.72 x 1.42 inches; 6.4 Ounces'}
This is so soft! It worked great but I don't use a lot of makeup. Just some pressed powder and eye line. I don't know how it would take off liquid and mascara. I like it just as a face washcloth for anytime. It's really soft. My 6 yr daughter really liked it too and wants one to wash her face with since we do that every morning.
Very soft
8Pcs Limit Comb Universal Hair Clipper Limit Comb Guide Attachment Size Barber Replacement
huanban072
['Description:  Features: 100% brand new and high quality Great for adding additional length and styles during your grooming, clipping, and trimming experience. Great for human hair as well. These easy to attach guide combs are a great accessory to meet your dog, cat, pets grooming needs. Fits standard adjustable clipper blades. Necessary tool for haircutting and hairdressing. Made of PP material, durable and easy to attach. Includes: 8 plastic attachment guide combs: 1/8’’, 1/4’’, 3/8’’, 1/2’’, 5/8’’, 3/4’’, 7/8’’, 1’’, left and right ear. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Health and Safety Focus:** The user maintains a strong interest in health and skincare products that address skin concerns like acne, prioritizing safety and effectiveness, especially for sensitive areas, including the face.

- **Grooming Tools Engagement:** Recently, the user has shown interest in grooming tools, specifically hair cutting kits, favoring products that offer functionality and quality. They appreciate well-made tools, even if they express skepticism towards associated components, indicating a practical mindset.

- **Comfort Preference:** They place a high value on comfort regarding product materials and fit, remaining cautious about potential irritants or adverse reactions.

- **Skeptical Yet Adaptive Evaluation:** The user employs a pragmatic approach towards evaluating product effectiveness, drawing from personal experiences while remaining willing to try new tools that enhance their grooming routine.

- **Functional Utility Over Aesthetics:** They prioritize functionality and therapeutic benefits in product selection, focusing on quality and practicality rather than superficial attributes.

- **Past Negative Experiences:** Previous adverse reactions to health-related products contribute to a cautious and thorough evaluation process for new items.

- **Family Consideration:** The user extends their engagement to family needs, showing care for products suitable for all ages, emphasizing an overall focus on safety and comfort.

Overall, the user prioritizes health, safety, comfort, and functionality while being critical yet open to new and practical grooming solutions that enhance their everyday experiences.
